Type.Name: ClipboardTextReceivedFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ClipboardTextReceivedFunc(Clipboard clipboard, string text);
.class public auto ansi sealed ClipboardTextReceivedFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate for a function to be called when an application receives text from the clipboard.

remarks.para: If the clipboard is empty, text will be null.
